title: 3 and Out - Cheap Chargers, Bad Take Confession, Amazon’s Sherman Miss, Becton Bust
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Cheap Chargers, Bad Take Confession, Amazon’s Sherman Miss, Becton Bust
description:
John discusses what NFL players would command if there was a LIV Golf-style raid on NFL talent, why the Chargers going cheap on head coach with their stacked roster is a mistake, why Middlekauff is taking the L on his Minkah Fitzpatrick to the Steelers trade take, why Amazon should have given Richard Sherman the bag to call games with Al Michaels, and why Mekhi Becton busting isn’t surprising. 

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates. Go to  FanDuel for the best wagering action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
